idea-plugin.name: Midnight Moss Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Midnight Moss - A Dark Organic Theme

A carefully crafted dark theme that brings together the deep tranquility of midnight with the organic vitality of moss. Born from a terminal rice configuration, this theme offers a sophisticated palette that's easy on the eyes during those long coding sessions.

Features

  • Deep, comfortable dark background (#1c1c1c)
  • Organic moss-inspired accent colors (#5e8d87)
  • Optimized contrast ratios for extended use
  • Comprehensive syntax highlighting for all languages
  • Consistent styling across all IDE panels

Color Palette

  • Moss (#5e8d87) - Primary accent
  • Forest (#6e8f7c) - Classes, types
  • Ocean (#5d7e97) - Functions
  • Sage (#826d94) - Keywords
  • Amber (#a09262) - Strings
  • Wine (#9b6a6c) - Errors

Part of the Midnight Moss Theme collection, available for 15+ applications including VS Code, Vim, Neovim, Alacritty, tmux, and more.
